Module io.netty5.transport
Package io.netty5.channel.local

Class LocalServerChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.util.DefaultAttributeMap
      • io.netty5.channel.AbstractChannel<P,​L,​R>
        • io.netty5.channel.AbstractServerChannel<LocalChannel,​LocalAddress,​LocalAddress>
          • io.netty5.channel.local.LocalServerChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Channel, ChannelOutboundInvoker, ServerChannel, AttributeMap, FuturePromiseFactory, Comparable<Channel>
    public class LocalServerChannel
extends AbstractServerChannel<LocalChannel,​LocalAddress,​LocalAddress>
    A ServerChannel for the local transport which allows in VM communication.
